messages.title: A message from Eilidh
messages.content: Dear Friend, The future of Banff & Buchan matters to me...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Dr Eilidh Whiteford is your local SNP candidate for the Westminster election.
Surveying work on the new Smith Embankment at Peterhead. The Scottish Government has invested over £10 million in the project—creating over 150 jobs and securing many more.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fighting for local jobs and industry
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Eilidh Whiteford will be a strong voice for this area—fighting for local jobs and investment and against Tory cuts.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Help for local households and High Streets
keyPolicies.policyDescription: All across Scotland households are feeling the pinch due to increasing energy and essential services costs, but with an excellent energy, both our personal and the town centre suffer as a result. That's why the SNP, led by Scotland's Finance Minister John Swinney, has put their weapons to these critical matters.
The fishing industry is crucial to the local economy in processing and at sea. Our local champion Eilidh Whiteford will and did, local interests in Westminster on the new Fish Policy.

housing.content: All across Scotland households are feeling the pinch due to increasing energy and essential services costs...

leaflet.personalStatement: Eilidh lives in the constituency and campaigns on fishing, pensions and community issues full-time.

endorsements.endorsement: Eilidh Whiteford will be a strong voice for this area—fighting for local jobs and investment and against Tory cuts.
This is my first vote in a General Election and I intend to give it to Eilidh because I believe we need a strong voice to represent us in Westminster.

endorsements.endorser: Banff and Buchan MSP Stewart Stevenson
endorsements.endorsement: Campaigning alongside Eilidh over the last two years I have no doubt she has the energy, skills and experience to be a superb MP for our communities.

Sending the right message with your vote, to ensure North-East Scotland's voice is heard clearly in the corridors of power - that is what you'll be doing with your support for Eilidh and the SNP at this election. Together we will make Scotland better.

quotes.text: Eilidh Whiteford has been a tireless advocate for people here in Banff & Buchan.
Eilidh will ensure that North-East Scotland's voice is heard clearly in the corridors of power.

images.caption: Eilidh Whiteford ... local, hard working and effective
